name: @vue-interface/middleware
description: An extensible Middleware component for VueRouter that closely mimic's Laravel's route middelware.
author: Justin Kimbrell

scripts.pre-release: npm run build; git add . -A; git commit -m 'pre-release commit'
scripts.release-patch: npm run pre-release && npm version patch -m "%s" && npm run release;
scripts.release-minor: npm run pre-release && npm version minor -m "%s" && npm run release;
scripts.release-major: npm run pre-release && npm version major -m "%s" && npm run release;
scripts.release: git add . -A; git commit; git push --tags origin; npm publish;
